long_description: With a deep, stable cockpit for flatwater, mellow rivers and calm bays, the Aquaglide Yakima(TM) Tandem Inflatable Kayak offers big fun and high durability at a great value. Kayak features a tough PVC construction and a polyester covering that stands up to on-the-water use and resists degradation from UV light. Supportive inflatable seats offer a comfortable spot to enjoy your time on the water. The Aquaglide Yakima Tandem Inflatable Kayak includes deck covers to resist splashes and deck bungess to store extra gear. .
short_description: With a deep, stable cockpit for flatwater, mellow rivers and calm bays, the Aquaglide Yakima(TM) Tandem Inflatable Kayak offers big fun and high durability at a great value.
